resources.name: Detailed information on public opinion website

description:
On average, only 10% of Europeans have heard of CO2 capture and storage, while 58% have heard of solar photovoltaics, according to the first Eurobarometer survey on CO2 capture and storage (CCS). 83% of respondents think CO2 emissions have a high impact on climate change, but they need better information about the options for reducing CO2 emissions that are covered by EU low-carbon energy policies.
#####The results by volumes are distributed as follows:
* Volume A: Countries
* Volume AA: Groups of countries
* Volume A' (AP): Trends
* Volume AA' (AAP): Trends of groups of countries
* Volume B: EU/socio-demographics
* Volume C: Country/socio-demographics
title: Special Eurobarometer 364: Public Awareness and Acceptance of CO2 capture and storage
name: S848_75_1_EBS364
rdf:

						<dct:description xml:lang="en">On average, only 10% of Europeans have heard of CO2 capture and storage, while 58% have heard of solar photovoltaics, according to the first Eurobarometer survey on CO2 capture and storage (CCS). 83% of respondents think CO2 emissions have a high impact on climate change, but they need better information about the options for reducing CO2 emissions that are covered by EU low-carbon energy policies.
#####The results by volumes are distributed as follows:
* Volume A: Countries
* Volume AA: Groups of countries
* Volume A' (AP): Trends
* Volume AA' (AAP): Trends of groups of countries
* Volume B: EU/socio-demographics
* Volume C: Country/socio-demographics  </dct:description><!--An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context -->
